item.title: You Should Use You Should Use
item.description: A while ago I installed a zsh plugin to remind me of my plugins called You Should Use (ysu). The idea behind it is fairly simple, if you have configured an alias for a given command, it will will remind you about that alias if you use the command directly, rather call it via the alias. For example, when I use task warrior to mark a task completed, I may type:
